panels.description: Displays the Airflow status. If no scheduler/api/worker/dagprocessor pod is available it displays the DOWN status. If at least one pod of each type (scheduler/api/worker/dagprocessor) is available, but some scheduler/api/worker/dagprocessor pods are in other states than running, it displays DEGRADED status, otherwise displays UP status.

targets.expr: sum(kube_deployment_status_replicas_available{exported_namespace=~"$airflow_namespace", deployment=~".*-scheduler", cluster=~"$cluster"})*sum(kube_deployment_status_replicas_available{exported_namespace=~"$airflow_namespace", deployment=~".*-api-server", cluster=~"$cluster"})*sum(kube_deployment_status_replicas_available{exported_namespace=~"$airflow_namespace", deployment=~".*-dag-processor", cluster=~"$cluster"})*sum(kube_deployment_status_replicas_available{exported_namespace=~"$airflow_namespace", deployment=~".*-worker", cluster=~"$cluster"} OR on() vector(1))*sum(kube_statefulset_status_replicas_ready{exported_namespace=~"$airflow_namespace", statefulset=~".*-worker", cluster=~"$cluster"} OR on() vector(1))*(sum(kube_deployment_status_replicas_unavailable{exported_namespace=~"$airflow_namespace", deployment=~".*-scheduler", cluster=~"$cluster"}) + sum(kube_deployment_status_replicas_unavailable{exported_namespace=~"$airflow_namespace", deployment=~".*-api-server", cluster=~"$cluster"}) + sum(kube_deployment_status_replicas_unavailable{exported_namespace=~"$airflow_namespace", deployment=~".*-dag-processor", cluster=~"$cluster"}) + (sum(kube_deployment_status_replicas_unavailable{exported_namespace=~"$airflow_namespace", deployment=~".*-worker", cluster=~"$cluster"}) OR on() vector(0)) + (sum(kube_statefulset_status_replicas{exported_namespace=~"$airflow_namespace", statefulset=~".*-worker", cluster=~"$cluster"}) OR on() vector(0)) - (sum(kube_statefulset_status_replicas_ready{exported_namespace=~"$airflow_namespace", statefulset=~".*-worker", cluster=~"$cluster"}) OR on() vector(0)) -0.5 )

panels.title: Airflow State

panels.description: Shows the number of unavailable pods in the airflow namespace except for flower

targets.expr: sum(kube_deployment_status_replicas_unavailable{exported_namespace=~"$airflow_namespace", deployment=~".*-scheduler"}) + sum(kube_deployment_status_replicas_unavailable{exported_namespace=~"$airflow_namespace", deployment=~".*-api-server"}) + sum(kube_deployment_status_replicas_unavailable{exported_namespace=~"$airflow_namespace", deployment=~".*-dag-processor"}) + (sum(kube_deployment_status_replicas_unavailable{exported_namespace=~"$airflow_namespace", deployment=~".*-worker"}) OR on() vector(0)) + (sum(kube_statefulset_status_replicas{exported_namespace=~"$airflow_namespace", statefulset=~".*-worker"}) OR on() vector(0)) - (sum(kube_statefulset_status_replicas_ready{exported_namespace=~"$airflow_namespace", statefulset=~".*-worker"}) OR on() vector(0))

panels.description: Shows number of failed DAGs in the specified range

targets.expr: max without(instance, pod) (round(increase(airflow_dag_last_status{status="failed", namespace="$airflow_namespace", cluster=~"$cluster"}[$__range])) + round(increase(airflow_dag_status{status="failed", namespace="$airflow_namespace", cluster=~"$cluster"}[$__range])) != 0)

panels.description: Shows the number of started and finished tasks

targets.expr: airflow_ti_finish{dag_id=~"$dag_id", task_id=~"$task_id", namespace="$airflow_namespace", state="success", pod="$statsd_pod", cluster=~"$cluster"}

panels.title: Number of started and finished tasks

panels.description: Shows failed tasks

targets.expr: airflow_ti_finish{dag_id=~"$dag_id", task_id=~"$task_id", namespace="$airflow_namespace", state="None", pod="$statsd_pod", cluster=~"$cluster"}
airflow_ti_finish{dag_id=~"$dag_id", task_id=~"$task_id", namespace="$airflow_namespace", state="failed", pod="$statsd_pod", cluster=~"$cluster"}

panels.title: Failed tasks

panels.description: Shows task max CPU usage percent for the latest task run
panels.title: Task max CPU usage percent

panels.description: Shows task max memory usage percent for the latest task run
panels.title: Task max memory usage percent

panels.description: Show if Airflow SM is UP, DOWN or Not Installed
panels.title: Airflow Site Manager State

panels.description: Shows Airflow SM pod states

targets.expr:
sum((kube_pod_status_phase{cluster="$cluster", exported_namespace="$airflow_namespace", exported_pod=~"airflow-site-manager.*", phase="Failed"} * 2) or (kube_pod_status_phase{cluster="$cluster", exported_namespace="$airflow_namespace", exported_pod=~"airflow-site-manager.*", phase="Pending"} * 4) or
(kube_pod_status_phase{cluster="$cluster", exported_namespace="$airflow_namespace", exported_pod=~"airflow-site-manager.*", phase="Running"} * 8) or 
(kube_pod_status_phase{cluster="$cluster", exported_namespace="$airflow_namespace", exported_pod=~"airflow-site-manager.*", phase="Succeeded"} * 16) or 
(kube_pod_status_phase{cluster="$cluster", exported_namespace="$airflow_namespace", exported_pod=~"airflow-site-manager.*", phase="Unknown"} * 32)) by (exported_pod)

panels.title: Pod Status

panels.description: Shows CPU usage by Airflow SM pod in the namespace

targets.expr:
sum(sum by (namespace, pod, container)(
rate(container_cpu_usage_seconds_total{cluster="$cluster",namespace="$airflow_namespace", pod=~"airflow-site-manager.*", container!~"POD|", name!="", image!=""}[2m]))) by (pod,container)

panels.title: CPU Usage

panels.description: Shows Memory usage by Airflow SM pod in the namespace

targets.expr: sum(container_memory_working_set_bytes{cluster="$cluster", namespace="$airflow_namespace", pod=~"airflow-site-manager.*", container!~"POD|", container!~"POD|", image!=""}) by (container)

panels.title: Memory Usage
